value.stringValue: Case > Google Docs & Attachments: Tech Google Form response URL captured

formulas.description: Validates how many contacts are identified and flags them accordingly

Flow.label: RAS Case Automation

textTemplates.name: Case_Opt_In_ChatterMSG
textTemplates.text: School Account > Managed Network Add-on Services> Remote Access: Opt In

textTemplates.name: Case_TechFormSent_ChatterMSG
textTemplates.text: Case > Google Docs & Attachments: Verification Google Form response URL captured

textTemplates.name: Chttr_OptOut
textTemplates.text: The school has responded and Opted Out of having the service implemented. Email sent to case contact confirming this and case is now closed by requester

textTemplates.description: Chatter MSG request to check implementer details
textTemplates.name: ImplementerContactDetails
textTemplates.text: {!CaseOwnerNotQueue} Tech Form could not be sent as ICT Implementation Contact details are inconclusive and following updated - Case > Status: 'Under Action', Case > Form Status: {!sObjCase.Form_Status__c}, Case > Google Docs & Attachments: Verification Google Form response URL captured . Please review the ICT Implementer Contact Details provided via email, as they either do not exist or are not unique. Then Populate the ICT Implementation Contact and ICT Implementation Provider and save these records on the case and then click button 'Send Form'

textTemplates.name: Prompt_NextSteps_SE
textTemplates.text: Request is now being submitted to Spark . Case > Google Docs & Attachments: SE Review Google Form response URL captured . Please do not set the service as Active on the Account until it has been implemented and the Service Request has been completed by Spark

textTemplates.name: RAS_Config_Complete
